definition: street name for lysergic acid diethylamide, administer a drug to
details:
noun
- street name for lysergic acid diethylamide
= synonyms: acid
- a measured portion of medicine taken at any one time

= example: the quantity of an active agent, substance, or radiation taken in or absorbed at any one time

- a communicable infection transmitted by sexual intercourse or genital contact

verb

- treat with an agent
